title: Fontlab Question
content:
any ideas why I am unable to print anything other than a font table and a glyph list out of fontlab print menu? everything else crashes the program and makes me restart it. i'm on a mac, 10.4.9 and fontlab version 5.0.4. i think i recently upgraded to the newest version build but it was doing this before on version 5.0.1 as well

thanks
author: Will Miller

comments.content:
Ditto. Crashes every time I try to print.

Mac, 10.4.11, FLS 5.0.4

apparently we are the only two...

w|m
Move it to the build forum.

Try the second tip from  
 [http://www.fontlab.com/support/faq/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200638/http:/www.fontlab.com/support/faq/ "http://www.fontlab.com/support/faq/")  
otherwise go  
 [http://www.fontlab.com/support/problem/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200638/http:/www.fontlab.com/support/problem/ "http://www.fontlab.com/support/problem/")

A.
